alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hancock County through 645 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stennis Space Center, or 9 miles southeast of Picayune, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stennis Space Center, Kiln and Shoreline Park. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 6 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
